item.title: Saddest pk video ive ever seen in my life
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:26, topic:353022”][quote author=Errorist link=topic=449336.msg3300346#msg3300346 date=1281253083]

[quote author=abatssk8ter link=topic=449336.msg3300133#msg3300133 date=1281235506]

[quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=449336.msg3296834#msg3296834 date=1281007130]
I believe Runescape Discussion was put there for a reason, don’t you?
[/quote]If this was about RuneScape then yes, But no this is about YouTube not runescape.
[/quote]He doesn’t even know the difference between YouTube and RuneScape. Oh my.
[/quote]You fucking retard’s the content inside the video belongs to RUNESCAPE…[/quote]video is hosted on youtube.com not runescape.com

item.title: Saddest pk video ive ever seen in my life
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“abatssk8ter, post:22, topic:353022”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=449336.msg3297137#msg3297137 date=1281029070]
Why are you posting all of these videos… make one thread called ‘YouTube Video Posting’ and then post each of them there.
[/quote]1.) You are and always have been a hater, Fuck off and stop making contact with me.
2.) Kid you’re not a mod, Stop acting like one to raise your postcount.
3.) Davidscape sucked so much dick it’s not even funny half assed server if i ever seen one, you’re not cool and you don’t belong here.[/quote]

DavidScape is one of the best 508’s I’ve ever seen, stop hating on it because you can’t program.

Lol this kid
He isnt really “poor”
i added him on rs and i went and asked him how rich he was.
He then traded me and showed me he had full dharoks, a whip, an amulet of fury, and dboots.
So no, Hes not really that “poor”
[/quote]
no

I lol’d at the vids.[/quote]
yes
